EmailTemplate.name: WO 06 - In Production Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Work Order {!Order.OrderNumber} move to In Production
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Phunion,
{!Order.OrderNumber} for {!Order.WOAccountLink__c} is In Production. Please confirm ship-to address and due date are accurate.
{!Order.WONameLink__c}
Thanks, Ralph the Rooster
